availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Eli Nichols Jr. (Caldwell County, Kentucky, soldier.)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Eli Nichols Senior. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 355B.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Caldwell County Administration Bonds, 1830-1869; Vol 19-20, 1970-1975, p. 37 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com on March 28, 2021).
KYR-0001-020-0001.
